--   type:      Oracle Database 11g




CREATE TABLE Article
  (
    pubmed_id            INTEGER NOT NULL ,
    title                VARCHAR (200) ,
    authors              VARCHAR (300) ,
    Organism_taxonomy_id INTEGER
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Article ADD CONSTRAINT Article_PK PRIMARY KEY ( pubmed_id ) ;


CREATE TABLE Gene
  (
    gene_id          INTEGER NOT NULL ,
    name             VARCHAR (100) ,
    sequence         VARCHAR (1000) ,
    location         VARCHAR (150) ,
    aliases          VARCHAR (400) ,
    description      VARCHAR (400) ,
    Gene_category_id INTEGER
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Gene ADD CONSTRAINT Gene_PK PRIMARY KEY ( gene_id ) ;


CREATE TABLE GeneStress
  (
    Stress_id    INTEGER NOT NULL ,
    Gene_gene_id INTEGER NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE GeneStress ADD CONSTRAINT Relation_12_PK PRIMARY KEY ( Stress_id, Gene_gene_id ) ;


CREATE TABLE Gene_category
  ( id INTEGER NOT NULL , name VARCHAR (100)
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Gene_category ADD CONSTRAINT Gene_category_PK PRIMARY KEY ( id ) ;


CREATE TABLE Organism
  (
    taxonomy_id       INTEGER NOT NULL ,
    name              VARCHAR (300) ,
    common_name       VARCHAR (200) ,
    Organism_genus_id INTEGER NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Organism ADD CONSTRAINT Organism_PK PRIMARY KEY ( taxonomy_id ) ;


CREATE TABLE OrganismStress
  (
    Organism_taxonomy_id INTEGER NOT NULL ,
    Stress_id            INTEGER NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE OrganismStress ADD CONSTRAINT Relation_11_PK PRIMARY KEY ( Organism_taxonomy_id, Stress_id ) ;


CREATE TABLE Organism_genus
  ( id INTEGER NOT NULL , name VARCHAR (200)
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Organism_genus ADD CONSTRAINT Organism_genus_PK PRIMARY KEY ( id ) ;


CREATE TABLE Orthologs
  (
    ortholog_id  INTEGER NOT NULL ,
    name         VARCHAR (100) ,
    sequence     VARCHAR (1000) ,
    description  VARCHAR (400) ,
    Gene_gene_id INTEGER
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Orthologs ADD CONSTRAINT Orthologs_PK PRIMARY KEY ( ortholog_id ) ;


CREATE TABLE Stress
  ( id INTEGER NOT NULL , name VARCHAR (200)
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Stress ADD CONSTRAINT Stress_PK PRIMARY KEY ( id ) ;


CREATE TABLE Textmatch
  (
    id       INTEGER NOT NULL ,
    sentence VARCHAR (1000) ,
    score DOUBLE  ,
    Article_pubmed_id INTEGER
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Textmatch ADD CONSTRAINT Textmatch_PK PRIMARY KEY ( id ) ;


ALTER TABLE Article ADD CONSTRAINT Article_Organism_FK FOREIGN KEY ( Organism_taxonomy_id ) REFERENCES Organism ( taxonomy_id ) ;

ALTER TABLE OrganismStress ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ASS_2 FOREIGN KEY ( Organism_taxonomy_id ) REFERENCES Organism ( taxonomy_id ) ;

ALTER TABLE OrganismStress ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ASS_3 FOREIGN KEY ( Stress_id ) REFERENCES Stress ( id ) ;

ALTER TABLE GeneStress ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ASS_6 FOREIGN KEY ( Stress_id ) REFERENCES Stress ( id ) ;

ALTER TABLE GeneStress ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ASS_7 FOREIGN KEY ( Gene_gene_id ) REFERENCES Gene ( gene_id ) ;

ALTER TABLE Gene ADD CONSTRAINT Gene_Gene_category_FK FOREIGN KEY ( Gene_category_id ) REFERENCES Gene_category ( id ) ;

ALTER TABLE Organism ADD CONSTRAINT Organism_Organism_genus_FK FOREIGN KEY ( Organism_genus_id ) REFERENCES Organism_genus ( id ) ;

ALTER TABLE Orthologs ADD CONSTRAINT Orthologs_Gene_FK FOREIGN KEY ( Gene_gene_id ) REFERENCES Gene ( gene_id ) ;

ALTER TABLE Textmatch ADD CONSTRAINT Textmatch_Article_FK FOREIGN KEY ( Article_pubmed_id ) REFERENCES Article ( pubmed_id ) ;
